title: When Big Tech calls 911
description:
In this episode, two stories on one theme: how tech companies interact with communities they're located in, and their impact on emergency services.

Featuring
Anjeanette Damon
Sarah Emerson

Links to resources discussed:
West World: Anjeanette Damon's episode for The City 

The City Podcast

How Facebook Bought a Police Force

Host:
Arielle Duhaime-Ross (@adrs), host and lead reporter of Reset

About Recode by Vox:
Recode by Vox helps you understand how tech is changing the world — and changing us.

Follow Us:
Newsletter: Recode Daily 
Twitter: @Recode
